snippet: Gasoline prices have been rising, mainly because of higher global crude prices that have been gaining because of Egyptian and Nigerian unrest.
abstract: Gasoline prices continue to rise, with AAA report finding that gallon of regular is roughly 17 cents more expensive than in previous year; increase is mainly due to higher global crude prices that have been gaining because of unrest in Egypt, Nigeria and elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: Gasoline prices have been rising, mainly because of higher global crude prices that have been gaining because of Egyptian and Nigerian unrest.

headline.main: Sudden Spike in Gas Prices, but Increases May Be Short-Lived
headline.print_headline: Sudden Spike in Gas Prices, but Increases May Be Short-Lived
